value.value:
@JSON(
replace(
concat('[',
replace(
replace(
join(activity('Keep only files').output.Value,concat('*"filetype":"',item().filetype,'", "path":"',item().path,'"}'))
, '}*', ', ')
, '}{', '},{')
, ']')
, '}]', concat(', "filetype":"',item().filetype,'", "path":"',item().path,'"}') )
)

activities.name: Combine File List Start with Mid
Preserve File List Mid from End

dependsOn.activity: Combine File List Start with Mid

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerAlternateKey as string,
		GeographyAlternateKey as string,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		NameStyle as string,
		BirthDate as string,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		Suffix as string,
		Gender as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		YearlyIncome as string,
		TotalChildren as string,
		NumberChildrenAtHome as string,
		HouseOwnerFlag as string,
		NumberCarsOwned as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceCustomer
source(output(
		HUB_Customer_HK as string,
		CustomerAlternateKey as string,
		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HubCustomer
source(output(
		HUB_Customer_HK as string,
		SAT_Customer_HDIFF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SatCustomer
source(output(
		LINK_CustomerGeography_HK as string,
		HUB_Customer_HK as string,
		HUB_Geography_HK as string,
		CustomerAlternateKey as string,
		GeographyAlternateKey as string,
		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LinkCustomerGeography
SourceCustomer derive(LINK_CustomerGeography_HK = sha2(512, CustomerAlternateKey, GeographyAlternateKey),
		HUB_Customer_HK = sha2(512, CustomerAlternateKey),
		HUB_Geography_HK = sha2(512, GeographyAlternateKey),
		SAT_Customer_HDIFF = sha2(512, CustomerAlternateKey, GeographyAlternateKey,Title,FirstName,MiddleName,LastName,NameStyle,BirthDate,MaritalStatus,Suffix,Gender,EmailAddress,YearlyIncome,TotalChildren,NumberChildrenAtHome,HouseOwnerFlag,NumberCarsOwned,AddressLine1,AddressLine2),
		LOAD_TS = currentTimestamp()) ~> HashColumns
HashColumns, HubCustomer exists(HashColumns@HUB_Customer_HK == HubCustomer@HUB_Customer_HK,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckNewCustomer
CheckNewCustomer select(mapColumn(
		CustomerAlternateKey,
		HUB_Customer_HK,
		LOAD_TS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> NewHubCustomer
HashColumns, SatCustomer exists(HashColumns@HUB_Customer_HK == SatCustomer@HUB_Customer_HK
	&& HashColumns@SAT_Customer_HDIFF == SatCustomer@SAT_Customer_HDIFF,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckNewSatCustomer
CheckNewSatCustomer select(mapColumn(
		Title,
		FirstName,
		MiddleName,
		LastName,
		NameStyle,
		BirthDate,
		MaritalStatus,
		Suffix,
		Gender,
		EmailAddress,
		YearlyIncome,
		TotalChildren,
		NumberChildrenAtHome,
		HouseOwnerFlag,
		NumberCarsOwned,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		HUB_Customer_HK,
		SAT_Customer_HDIFF,
		LOAD_TS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> NewSatCustomer
HashColumns, LinkCustomerGeography exists(HashColumns@LINK_CustomerGeography_HK == LinkCustomerGeography@LINK_CustomerGeography_HK,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckNewLinkCustomerGeography
CheckNewLinkCustomerGeography select(mapColumn(
		CustomerAlternateKey,
		GeographyAlternateKey,
		LINK_CustomerGeography_HK,
		HUB_Customer_HK,
		HUB_Geography_HK,
		LOAD_TS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> NewLinkCustomerGeography
NewHubCustomer sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		HUB_Customer_HK as string,
		CustomerAlternateKey as string,
		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkHubCustomer
NewSatCustomer sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		HUB_Customer_HK as string,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		BirthDate as date,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		Suffix as string,
		Gender as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		YearlyIncome as decimal(19,4),
		TotalChildren as integer,
		NumberChildrenAtHome as integer,
		HouseOwnerFlag as string,
		NumberCarsOwned as integer,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		SAT_Customer_HDIFF as string,
		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkSatCustomer
NewLinkCustomerGeography sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		LINK_CustomerGeography_HK as string,
		HUB_Customer_HK as string,
		HUB_Geography_HK as string,
		CustomerAlternateKey as string,
		GeographyAlternateKey as string,
		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkLinkCustomerGeography

		GeographyAlternateKey as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvinceCode as string,
		StateProvinceName as string,

		EnglishCountryRegionName as string,
		PostalCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,

source(output(
		HUB_Geography_HK as string,
		GeographyAlternateKey as string,
		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HubGeography
source(output(
		HUB_Geography_HK as string,
		SAT_Geography_HDIFF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SatGeography
SourceGeogrpahy derive(HUB_Geography_HK = sha2(512, GeographyAlternateKey),
		LOAD_TS = currentTimestamp(),
		SAT_Geography_HDIFF = sha2(512, GeographyAlternateKey, City, StateProvinceCode, StateProvinceName, CountryRegionCode, EnglishCountryRegionName, PostalCode)) ~> HashColumns
HashColumns, HubGeography exists(HashColumns@HUB_Geography_HK == HubGeography@HUB_Geography_HK,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'both')~> CheckNewGeography
CheckNewGeography select(mapColumn(
		GeographyAlternateKey,
		LOAD_TS,
		HUB_Geography_HK
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> NewHubGeography
HashColumns, SatGeography exists(HashColumns@HUB_Geography_HK == SatGeography@HUB_Geography_HK
	&& HashColumns@SAT_Geography_HDIFF == SatGeography@SAT_Geography_HDIFF,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckNewSatGeography
CheckNewSatGeography select(mapColumn(
		City,
		StateProvinceCode,
		StateProvinceName,
		CountryRegionCode,
		EnglishCountryRegionName,
		PostalCode,
		HUB_Geography_HK,
		LOAD_TS,
		SAT_Geography_HDIFF
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> NewSatGeography
NewHubGeography sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		HUB_Geography_HK as string,
		GeographyAlternateKey as string,
		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkHubGeography
NewSatGeography sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		HUB_Geography_HK as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvinceCode as string,
		StateProvinceName as string,
		CountryRegionCode as string,
		EnglishCountryRegionName as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		SAT_Geography_HDIFF as string,
		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		HUB_Geography_HK,
		City,
		StateProvinceCode,
		StateProvinceName,
		CountryRegionCode,
		EnglishCountryRegionName,
		PostalCode,
		SAT_Geography_HDIFF,
		LOAD_TS
	)) ~> SinkSatGeography

	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',

SourceInternetSales derive(LINK_InternetSales_HK = sha2(512, ProductAlternateKey,CustomerAlternateKey,SalesOrderNumber,SalesOrderLineNumber),

		LOAD_TS = currentTimestamp(),
		HUB_Product_HK = sha2(512, ProductAlternateKey),
		SAT_InternetSales_HDIFF = sha2(512, ProductAlternateKey,CustomerAlternateKey,SalesOrderNumber,SalesOrderLineNumber,RevisionNumber,OrderQuantity,UnitPrice,ExtendedAmount,UnitPriceDiscountPct,DiscountAmount,ProductStandardCost,TotalProductCost,SalesAmount,TaxAmt,Freight,CarrierTrackingNumber,CustomerPONumber,OrderDate,DueDate)) ~> HashColumns
HashColumns, LinkInternetSales exists(HashColumns@LINK_InternetSales_HK == LinkInternetSales@LINK_InternetSales_HK,
	negate:true,

CheckNewLinkInternetSales select(mapColumn(

	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,

	&& HashColumns@SAT_InternetSales_HDIFF == SatInternetSales@SAT_InternetSales_HDIFF,

		ExtendedAmount,

		DiscountAmount,

		TotalProductCost,

		Freight,
		CarrierTrackingNumber,
		CustomerPONumber,
		OrderDate,

	),

	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		LINK_InternetSales_HK as string,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		OrderQuantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		ExtendedAmount as decimal(19,4),
		UnitPriceDiscountPct as double,
		DiscountAmount as double,
		ProductStandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		TotalProductCost as decimal(19,4),
		SalesAmount as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		CarrierTrackingNumber as string,
		CustomerPONumber as string,

	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',

		ProductAlternateKey,

	),

HashColumns, SatProduct exists(HashColumns@HUB_Product_HK == SatProduct@HUB_Product_HK
	&& HashColumns@SAT_Product_HDIFF == SatProduct@SAT_Product_HDIFF,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckNewSatProduct

		SizeUnitMeasureCode,

		StandardCost,
		FinishedGoodsFlag,
		Color,

		ReorderPoint,

		LOAD_TS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,

sources.name: TripData
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  TripData

typeProperties.script:
section Section1; shared #"TripData" = let AdfDoc = Web.Contents("https://bdataadlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/nyctaxidata-staging/trip_data/trip_data_1.csv?sv=2018-03-28&sig=On4A%2BKZBoXW0Ro4Q3x%2FWTJjNuIoB6f2SKAptnVXioWU%3D&spr=https&se=2019-11-08T20%3A49%3A38Z&srt=sco&ss=bf&sp=rwl"),Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]), PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true]), TrimmedHeaders = Table.TransformColumnNames(PromotedHeaders, (columnName as text) as text => Text.Trim(columnName)) in TrimmedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = TripData,
  ChangedType = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"trip_distance", type number}, {"pickup_longitude", type number}, {"pickup_latitude", type number}, {"dropoff_longitude", type number}, {"dropoff_latitude", type number}}),
  Lat1_Rad = Table.AddColumn(ChangedType, "Lat1_Rad", each ([pickup_latitude] / 180) * Number.PI),
  Lon1_Rad = Table.AddColumn(Lat1_Rad, "Lon1_Rad", each ([pickup_longitude] / 180) * Number.PI),
  Lat2_Rad = Table.AddColumn(Lon1_Rad, "Lat2_Rad", each ([dropoff_latitude] / 180)    * Number.PI),
  Lon2_Rad = Table.AddColumn(Lat2_Rad, "Lon2_Rad", each ([dropoff_longitude] / 180) * Number.PI),
  Distance_Mi = Table.AddColumn(Lon2_Rad, "Distance_Mi", each Number.Acos(Number.Sin([Lat1_Rad]) * Number.Sin([Lat2_Rad]) + Number.Cos([Lat1_Rad]) * Number.Cos([Lat2_Rad]) * Number.Cos([Lon2_Rad]-[Lon1_Rad])) * 3959),
  RemovedColumns = Table.RemoveColumns(Distance_Mi, {"Lat1_Rad", "Lon1_Rad", "Lat2_Rad", "Lon2_Rad"})
in
  RemovedColumns;

sources.name: TripData
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  TripData

sources.name: TripFares
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  TripFares

typeProperties.script:
section Section1; shared #"TripData" = let AdfDoc = Web.Contents("https://bdataadlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/nyctaxidata-staging/trip_data/trip_data_1.csv?sv=2018-03-28&sig=GqfnzpNsitPfmZH8AwnhXmymQUcC4VSLFZAg9z%2BFJuA%3D&spr=https&se=2019-11-08T19%3A15%3A35Z&srt=sco&ss=bf&sp=rwl"),Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]), PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true]), TrimmedHeaders = Table.TransformColumnNames(PromotedHeaders, (columnName as text) as text => Text.Trim(columnName)) in TrimmedHeaders;shared #"TripFares" = let AdfDoc = Web.Contents("https://bdataadlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/nyctaxidata-staging/trip_fare/trip_fare_1.csv?sv=2018-03-28&sig=1p0MCkz9EoTNb5RmDfw1HL%2F2Sl2QKvOllBw0kbSgbGs%3D&spr=https&se=2019-11-08T19%3A15%3A37Z&srt=sco&ss=bf&sp=rwl"),Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]), PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true]), TrimmedHeaders = Table.TransformColumnNames(PromotedHeaders, (columnName as text) as text => Text.Trim(columnName)) in TrimmedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = TripData,
  #"Inner Join" = Table.NestedJoin(Source, {"medallion", "hack_license", "vendor_id", "pickup_datetime"}, TripFares, {"medallion", "hack_license", "vendor_id", "pickup_datetime"}, "TripFares", JoinKind.Inner),
  #"Expanding Joined Tables" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Inner Join", "TripFares", {"medallion", "hack_license", "vendor_id", "pickup_datetime", "payment_type", "fare_amount", "surcharge", "mta_tax", "tip_amount", "tolls_amount", "total_amount"}, {"TripFares.medallion", "TripFares.hack_license", "TripFares.vendor_id", "TripFares.pickup_datetime", "TripFares.payment_type", "TripFares.fare_amount", "TripFares.surcharge", "TripFares.mta_tax", "TripFares.tip_amount", "TripFares.tolls_amount", "TripFares.total_amount"}),
  #"Converting to Decimal Types" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Expanding Joined Tables", {{"TripFares.total_amount", type number}, {"passenger_count", type number}, {"trip_time_in_secs", type number}, {"trip_distance", type number}}),
  #"Grouped rows" = Table.Group(#"Converting to Decimal Types", {"vendor_id"}, {{"total_passenger_count", each List.Sum([passenger_count]), type number}, {"total_trip_time_in_secs", each List.Sum([trip_time_in_secs]), type number}, {"total_trip_distance", each List.Sum([trip_distance]), type number}, {"total_trip_fare", each List.Sum([TripFares.total_amount]), type number}})
in
  #"Grouped rows";

source(output(
		GeographyAlternateKey as string,
		City as string,

source(output(
		HUB_Geography_HK as string,
		GeographyAlternateKey as string,
		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',

source(output(
		HUB_Geography_HK as string,
		SAT_Geography_HDIFF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',

SourceGeography derive(HUB_Geography_HK = sha2(512, GeographyAlternateKey),
		LOAD_TS = currentTimestamp(),
		SAT_Geography_HDIFF = sha2(512, GeographyAlternateKey,City,StateProvinceCode,StateProvinceName,CountryRegionCode,EnglishCountryRegionName,PostalCode)) ~> HashColumns
HashColumns, SourceHubGeography exists(HashColumns@HUB_Geography_HK == SourceHubGeography@HUB_Geography_HK,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckNewGeography
CheckNewGeography select(mapColumn(
		GeographyAlternateKey,
		HUB_Geography_HK,
		LOAD_TS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewGeography
HashColumns, SourceSatGeography exists(HashColumns@HUB_Geography_HK == SourceSatGeography@HUB_Geography_HK
	&& HashColumns@SAT_Geography_HDIFF == SourceSatGeography@SAT_Geography_HDIFF,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckNewSatgeogrphy

		CountryRegionCode,

		PostalCode,
		HUB_Geography_HK,
		LOAD_TS,
		SAT_Geography_HDIFF
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewSatGeography

		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,

	upsertable:false,

	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		HUB_Geography_HK,
		GeographyAlternateKey,
		LOAD_TS
	)) ~> SinkHubGeography

		CountryRegionCode,
		EnglishCountryRegionName,
		PostalCode,
		SAT_Geography_HDIFF,
		LOAD_TS
	)) ~> sinkSatGeography

source(output(
		GeographyAlternateKey as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvinceCode as string,
		StateProvinceName as string,
		CountryRegionCode as string,
		EnglishCountryRegionName as string,
		PostalCode as string
	),

		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),

source(output(

		SAT_Geography_HDIFF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceLastSatGeography
SourceGeography derive(HUB_Geography_HK = sha2(512, GeographyAlternateKey),
		LOAD_TS = currentTimestamp(),
		SAT_Geography_HDIFF = sha2(512, GeographyAlternateKey,City,StateProvinceCode,StateProvinceName,CountryRegionCode,EnglishCountryRegionName,PostalCode)) ~> HashColumns
HashColumns, HUBGeography exists(HashColumns@HUB_Geography_HK == HUBGeography@HUB_Geography_HK,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckNewGeography
CheckNewGeography select(mapColumn(
		GeographyAlternateKey,
		HUB_Geography_HK,
		LOAD_TS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> NewGeography
HashColumns, SourceLastSatGeography exists(HashColumns@HUB_Geography_HK == SourceLastSatGeography@HUB_Geography_HK
	&& HashColumns@SAT_Geography_HDIFF == SourceLastSatGeography@SAT_Geography_HDIFF,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckNewSatGeography
CheckNewSatGeography select(mapColumn(
		City,
		StateProvinceCode,
		StateProvinceName,
		CountryRegionCode,
		EnglishCountryRegionName,
		PostalCode,
		HUB_Geography_HK,
		LOAD_TS,
		SAT_Geography_HDIFF
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> NewSatGeography
NewGeography sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,

	),

	),

		HUB_Geography_HK as string,

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

SourceGeography derive(HUB_Geography_HK = sha2(256, GeographyAlternateKey),
		SAT_Geography_HDIFF = sha2(256, GeographyAlternateKey,City,StateProvinceCode,StateProvinceName,CountryRegionCode,EnglishCountryRegionName,PostalCode),
		LOAD_TS = currentTimestamp()) ~> HashColumns
HashColumns, SourceHUBGeography exists(HashColumns@HUB_Geography_HK == SourceHUBGeography@HUB_Geography_HK,

	&& HashColumns@SAT_Geography_HDIFF == SourcSatGeographyLatest@SAT_Geography_HDIFF,
	negate:true,

		City,
		StateProvinceCode,

source(output(
		batters as (batter as (id as string, type as string)[]),
		id as string,
		name as string,
		ppu as string,
		topping as (id as string, type as string)[],
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments',
	wildcardPaths:['ManyJSON_Objects.json']) ~> SourceJSONCakes
SourceJSONCakes foldDown(unroll(topping),
	mapColumn(
		id,
		cake_type = type,
		cake_name = name,
		ppu,
		topping_id = topping.id,
		topping_type = topping.type,
		batters
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenTopping
FlattenTopping foldDown(unroll(batters.batter, batters.batter),
	mapColumn(
		id,
		cake_type,
		cake_name,
		ppu,
		topping_id,
		topping_type,
		batter_id = batters.batter.id,
		batter_type = batters.batter.type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenBatter
FlattenBatter sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['flatten_output.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SinkFlattenOutput

source(output(
		dt as string,
		AverageTemperature as string,
		AverageTemperatureUncertainty as string,
		City as string,
		Country as string,
		Latitude as string,
		Longitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceTemperature
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceHeader
SourceTemperature filter(Country == 'Canada') ~> FilterCanadaData
SourceHeader, DataSortColumn union(byName: false)~> CombineDatasets
FilterCanadaData derive(row_id = 2) ~> DataSortColumn
CombineDatasets sort(asc(Column_8, true)) ~> SortOutput
SortOutput sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['GlobalLandTemperaturesByMajorCity-Canada.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Column_1,
		Column_2,
		Column_3,
		Column_4,
		Column_5,
		Column_6,
		Column_7
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SingOutputDataset

sources.name: ds_json_temp
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  ds_json_temp

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared ds_json_temp = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://azuesu2edusa.dfs.core.windows.net/jsondata/Test_JSON.txt"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = "|", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = ds_json_temp,
  #"Parsed JSON" = Table.TransformColumns(Source, {{"Detail", each Json.Document(_), type any}}),
  #"Expanded Detail" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Parsed JSON", "Detail", {"id", "type", "name"}, {"Detail.id", "Detail.type", "Detail.name"})
in
  #"Expanded Detail";

sources.name: ds_dataflow_sample
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  ds_dataflow_sample

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared ds_dataflow_sample = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://bdatablob.blob.core.windows.net/dataflows/ManyJSON_Objects - CSV.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = "|", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv])
in
  Csv;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = ds_dataflow_sample,
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"Column1", "column"}}),
  #"Parse JSON" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Renamed columns",{},Json.Document),
  #"Expand JSON" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Parse JSON", "column", {"id", "type", "name", "ppu", "batters", "topping"}, {"id", "type", "name", "ppu", "batters", "topping"}),
  #"Unroll topping" = Table.ExpandListColumn(#"Expand JSON", "topping"),
  #"Expand topping" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Unroll topping", "topping", {"id", "type"}, {"topping.id", "topping.type"}),
  #"Expand batters" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Expand topping", "batters", {"batter"}, {"batter"}),
  #"Unroll batter" = Table.ExpandListColumn(#"Expand batters", "batter"),
  #"Expand batter" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Unroll batter", "batter", {"id", "type"}, {"batter.id", "batter.type"})
in
  #"Expand batter";

resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/Delete files with Azure Data Factory FileSystem')]

properties.description: Please input a folder path as the parameter for this pipeline, and the pipeline will delete files which were last modified more than 30 days ago under the particular folder path.

activities.name: Data Flow Flatten JSON with cakes
